vernac_cmds: Lemma sqrt_var_maj : forall h:R, Rabs h <= 1 -> Rabs (sqrt (1 + h) - 1) <= Rabs h.
do 2 rewrite Ropp_plus_distr; rewrite Ropp_involutive; apply Rplus_le_compat_l.
pattern (1 + h) at 2; rewrite <- Rmult_1_r; unfold Rsqr; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
pattern 1 at 2; rewrite <- Rplus_0_r; apply Rplus_le_compat_l; left; assumption.
apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with 1; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rplus_comm; unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r.
pattern 1 at 2; rewrite <- sqrt_1; apply sqrt_lt_1.
pattern 1 at 2; rewrite <- Rsqr_1; apply Rsqr_incrst_1.
pattern 1 at 2; rewrite <- Rplus_0_r; apply Rplus_lt_compat_l; assumption.
apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with 1; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rplus_comm; unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r.
pattern 1 at 2; rewrite <- sqrt_1; apply sqrt_lt_1.
pattern 1 at 2; rewrite <- Rplus_0_r; apply Rplus_lt_compat_l; assumption.
rewrite Heq; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rsqr_1; rewrite sqrt_1; right; reflexivity.
unfold Rminus; do 2 rewrite <- (Rplus_comm (-1)); apply Rplus_le_compat_l.
pattern (1 + h) at 1; rewrite <- Rmult_1_r; unfold Rsqr; apply Rmult_le_compat_l.
pattern 1 at 1; rewrite <- Rplus_0_r; apply Rplus_le_compat_l; left; assumption.
rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rplus_comm; unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r.
pattern 1 at 1; rewrite <- sqrt_1; apply sqrt_le_1.
pattern 1 at 1; rewrite <- Rsqr_1; apply Rsqr_incr_1.
pattern 1 at 1; rewrite <- Rplus_0_r; apply Rplus_le_compat_l; left; assumption.
apply Rle_ge; left; apply Rplus_lt_reg_l with 1.
rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rplus_comm; unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r.
pattern 1 at 1; rewrite <- sqrt_1; apply sqrt_lt_1.
pattern 1 at 1; rewrite <- Rplus_0_r; apply Rplus_lt_compat_l; assumption.
replace (1 + h - 1) with h; [ right; reflexivity | ring ].
rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rplus_comm; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rplus_0_r; exact H.
left; rewrite Heq; rewrite Rplus_0_r; apply Rlt_0_1.
unfold continuity_pt; unfold continue_in; unfold limit1_in; unfold limit_in; unfold dist; simpl; unfold R_dist; intros.
unfold alpha; unfold Rmin; case (Rle_dec eps 1); intro.
rewrite sqrt_1; replace x with (1 + (x - 1)); [ idtac | ring ]; apply Rle_lt_trans with (Rabs (x - 1)).
apply Rlt_le_trans with alpha; [ apply H2 | unfold alpha; apply Rmin_l ].
Lemma sqrt_continuity_pt : forall x:R, 0 < x -> continuity_pt sqrt x.
unfold continuity_pt; unfold continue_in; unfold limit1_in; unfold limit_in; unfold dist; simpl; unfold R_dist; intros.
intro; elim (H0 _ H2); intros alp_1 H3.
change (0 < Rmin alpha x); unfold Rmin; case (Rle_dec alpha x); intro.
intros; replace x0 with (x + (x0 - x)); [ idtac | ring ]; replace (sqrt (x + (x0 - x)) - sqrt x) with (sqrt x * (sqrt (1 + (x0 - x) / x) - sqrt 1)).
rewrite H7; unfold Rminus, Rdiv; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rmult_0_l; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rabs_R0.
apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; rewrite <- H7; apply sqrt_lt_R0; assumption.
red; intro; rewrite H12 in H; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H).
symmetry ; apply Rplus_eq_reg_l with 1; rewrite Rplus_0_r; unfold Rdiv in H8; exact H8.
unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_comm; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; elim H6; intros.
rewrite Rmult_comm; apply Rmult_lt_reg_l with x.
rewrite Rmult_1_l; rewrite Rmult_comm; fold alpha.
red; intro; rewrite H10 in H; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H).
red; intro; rewrite H10 in H; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H).
red; intro; rewrite H8 in H7; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H7).
unfold Rminus; rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_l; rewrite Ropp_mult_distr_r_reverse; repeat rewrite <- sqrt_mult.
rewrite Rmult_1_r; rewrite Rmult_plus_distr_l; rewrite Rmult_1_r; unfold Rdiv; rewrite Rmult_comm; rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_l_sym.
red; intro; rewrite H7 in H; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H).
rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_l; rewrite Rplus_0_l; unfold Rdiv; rewrite <- Ropp_mult_distr_l_reverse.
rewrite Rmult_1_r; rewrite Rmult_comm; rewrite Rmult_assoc; rewrite <- Rinv_l_sym.
rewrite Rmult_1_r; left; apply Rlt_le_trans with (Rmin alpha x).
red; intro; rewrite H9 in H; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H).
apply Rinv_0_lt_compat; apply sqrt_lt_R0; apply H.
Lemma derivable_pt_lim_sqrt : forall x:R, 0 < x -> derivable_pt_lim sqrt x (/ (2 * sqrt x)).
intros; set (g := fun h:R => sqrt x + sqrt (x + h)).
intro; assert (H2 := continuity_pt_inv g 0 H0 H1).
unfold derivable_pt_lim; intros; unfold continuity_pt in H2; unfold continue_in in H2; unfold limit1_in in H2; unfold limit_in in H2; simpl in H2; unfold R_dist in H2.
elim (H2 eps H3); intros alpha H4.
replace ((sqrt (x + h) - sqrt x) / h) with (/ (sqrt x + sqrt (x + h))).
unfold inv_fct, g in H6; replace (2 * sqrt x) with (sqrt x + sqrt (x + 0)).
unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_0; rewrite Rplus_0_r; apply Rlt_le_trans with alpha1.
intro; cut (0 < sqrt x + sqrt (x + h)).
intro; apply Rmult_eq_reg_l with (sqrt x + sqrt (x + h)).
rewrite Rplus_comm; unfold Rdiv; rewrite <- Rmult_assoc; rewrite Rsqr_plus_minus; repeat rewrite Rsqr_sqrt.
rewrite Rplus_comm; unfold Rminus; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- Rinv_r_sym.
red; intro; rewrite H12 in H11; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H11).
red; intro; rewrite H12 in H11; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H11).
rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite Rplus_comm; rewrite Rplus_assoc; rewrite Rplus_opp_r; rewrite Rplus_0_r; left; apply Rlt_le_trans with alpha1.
unfold alpha1; unfold Rmin; case (Rle_dec alpha x); intro.
intro; red; intro; rewrite H2 in H1; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H1).
apply Rplus_lt_0_compat; apply sqrt_lt_R0; apply H.
replace g with (fct_cte (sqrt x) + comp sqrt (fct_cte x + id))%F; [ idtac | reflexivity ].
apply continuity_pt_const; unfold constant, fct_cte; intro; reflexivity.
apply continuity_pt_const; unfold constant, fct_cte; intro; reflexivity.
unfold plus_fct, fct_cte, id; rewrite Rplus_0_r; apply H.
Lemma derivable_pt_sqrt : forall x:R, 0 < x -> derivable_pt sqrt x.
Lemma derive_pt_sqrt : forall (x:R) (pr:0 < x), derive_pt sqrt x (derivable_pt_sqrt _ pr) = / (2 * sqrt x).
Lemma continuity_pt_sqrt : forall x:R, 0 <= x -> continuity_pt sqrt x.
unfold continuity_pt; unfold continue_in; unfold limit1_in; unfold limit_in; simpl; unfold R_dist; intros.
red; intro; rewrite H3 in H2; elim (Rlt_irrefl _ H2).
rewrite <- H1; rewrite sqrt_0; unfold Rminus; rewrite Ropp_0; rewrite Rplus_0_r; rewrite <- H1 in H5; unfold Rminus in H5; rewrite Ropp_0 in H5; rewrite Rplus_0_r in H5.
rewrite (Rabs_right x0 Hgt) in H5; apply H5.
apply sqrt_positivity; apply Rge_le; exact Hgt.
apply Rle_ge; apply sqrt_positivity; apply Rge_le; exact Hgt.
